entry.string: xarbb provides basic forum functions provided mainly from Xaraya utility modules. The forum itself is very light weight, but designed to handle large volume postings.
entry.translation: O xarBB contém funções fundamentais de um fórum fornecidas principalmente por módulos utilitários do Xaraya. Portanto, o módulo xarBB por si mesmo requer um mínimo de recursos, mas é capaz de suportar um grande volume de mensagens.

entry.string: From the menu, you have three choices. "Modify Configuration", "Add Forums", and "View Forums".
Modify Configuration -- Allows you to set certain configuration routines for forums.
View Forums -- Allows you to view the forums that you have configured on your system.
entry.translation: Exibir Fóruns -- Permite ao administrador exibir os fóruns configurados no sistema.

entry.string: Add Forums -- Allows you to add new forums to your system.
entry.translation: Adicionar Fóruns -- Permite ao administrador adicionar novos fóruns ao sistema.

entry.string: There is currently one block provided called Latest Posts. If the block is not showing as an option when adding a Block instance it may not have been registered. In this case please add the block type through Admin Blocks-Add Block Type

entry.translation: Não há ganchos incluídos com este módulo.
